function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential risk of transmission of contagious diseases through the digital signature validation process","Impact":"Spread of contagious diseases due to unmitigated transmission risk","Mitigation":"Implement secure data transmission protocols and use encryption to minimize the risk","Technologies":"Encryption, secure data transmission protocols","People":"Medical Doctors, Healthcare Providers, Patients","Owner":"Medical Institutions, Healthcare Organizations"},{"Description":"Unauthorized access to sensitive medical data stored on MedSC","Impact":"Privacy breach, potential exposure of sensitive medical information","Mitigation":"Implement strong access controls and encryption of sensitive data","Technologies":"Access controls, encryption","People":"Medical Doctors, Patients","Owner":"Medical Institutions, Healthcare Organizations"},{"Description":"Failure to validate the integrity of the encrypted file","Impact":"Potential compromise of patient data and medical records","Mitigation":"Develop and implement robust file validation processes and error-checking mechanisms","Technologies":"File validation algorithms, error-checking mechanisms","People":"Medical Doctors, Healthcare Providers, Patients","Owner":"Medical Institutions, Healthcare Organizations"}]}
